definitions.definition: Used to describe a shot where the ball deflects off the edge of the bat, but is not caught by the slips or wicket-keeper and instead results in runs for the batsman .
Having alternating periods of good and bad performances; inconsistent .
examples: Jones has always been a streaky hitter
definitions.label_groups: chiefly of a person , usually Canada , US

definitions.definition: Having periods of irritation or bad temper.
Not well-executed, due to luck more than skill.

secondary_definitions: ( cricket ) Used to describe a shot where the ball deflects off the edge of the bat, but is not caught by the slips or wicket-keeper and instead results in runs for the batsman .
( chiefly of a person , usually Canada , US ) Having alternating periods of good and bad performances; inconsistent .
( archaic , slang ) Having periods of irritation or bad temper.
( soccer ) Not well-executed, due to luck more than skill.
